sentences.sContent: After consulting with her daughter and manager, she decided to take on the part, on her terms.
sentences.sCn: 同她的女儿兼经纪人商量之后，她决定按她的要求接受那个角色。

sentences.sContent: The two countries will have to consult their allies.
sentences.sCn: 两国得同各自的盟友协商。

remMethod.val: con(共同) + sult(跳) → 跳到一起商量 → 交换意见

words.tran: 咨询；磋商；[临床] 会诊；讨论会

trans.tranCn: 交换意见， 商议； 当顾问
trans.tranOther: If a person or group of people consults with other people or consults them, or if two people or groups consult, they talk and exchange ideas and opinions about what they might decide to do

trans.tranCn: 请教，找…商量；咨询；查阅，查看
trans.tranOther: to ask for information or advice from someone because it is their job to know something
